sql.isNotEmpty: u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID in (select a.STOREIN_DIFF_ID from DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID in (select a.STOREIN_DIFF_ID from DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID in (select a.STOREIN_DIFF_ID from DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID, u.STOREIN_DIFF_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.SEND_DEAL_PSON_ID, u.SEND_DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.SEND_DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SEND_DEAL_TIME, u.RECV_DEAL_PSON_ID, u.REVC_DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.RECV_DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECV_DEAL_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_STOREIN_DIFF u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_STOREIN_DIFF u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN_DIFF( STOREIN_DIFF_ID, RECV_DEAL_TIME, RECV_DEAL_PSON_ID, REVC_DEAL_PSON_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#, to_date(#RECV_DEAL_TIME#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #RECV_DEAL_PSON_ID#, #REVC_DEAL_PSON_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_STOREIN_DIFF
RECV_DEAL_TIME = sysdate RECV_DEAL_PSON_ID = #RECV_DEAL_PSON_ID# REVC_DEAL_PSON_NAME = #REVC_DEAL_PSON_NAME# STATE = #STATE# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate
where STOREIN_DIFF_ID = #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#

update DRP_DIFF_DEAL_DTL
DIFF_RSON = #DIFF_RSON# DEAL_WAY = #DEAL_WAY# REMARK = #REMARK#
where DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID = #DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_STOREIN_DIFF set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# , UPDATOR =#UPDATOR# ,UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# , UPD_TIME = sysdate where STOREIN_DIFF_ID = #STOREIN_DIFF_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID, u.STOREIN_DIFF_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.SEND_DEAL_PSON_ID, u.SEND_DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.SEND_DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SEND_DEAL_TIME, u.RECV_DEAL_PSON_ID, u.REVC_DEAL_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.RECV_DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECV_DEAL_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_STOREIN_DIFF u where u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID = #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.NOTICE_NUM, u.REAL_NUM, u.DIFF_NUM, u.DIFF_AMOUNT, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL( STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID, STOREIN_DIFF_ID, DEL_FLAG )values( #STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID in ($STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_IDS$)
update DRP_STOREIN_DIFF_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where STOREIN_DIFF_ID = #STOREIN_DIFF_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql: select u.DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID, u.STOREIN_DIFF_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.DIFF_NUM, u.DIFF_RSON, u.DEAL_WAY, u.DIFF_AMOUNT, u.DIFF_ATT, u.REMARK, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_DIFF_DEAL_DTL u
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_DIFF_DEAL_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID in ($DIFF_DEAL_DTL_IDS$)
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_DIFF_DEAL_DTL
DECT_RATE = #DECT_RATE# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# DECT_PRICE = #DECT_PRICE# PRICE = #PRICE# REMARK = #REMARK# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# DIFF_NUM = #DIFF_NUM# DIFF_RSON = #DIFF_RSON# BRAND = #BRAND# DEAL_WAY = #DEAL_WAY# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# DIFF_AMOUNT = #DIFF_AMOUNT# DIFF_ATT = #DIFF_ATT# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO#
where DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID = #DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_DIFF_DEAL_DTL( DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID, STOREIN_DIFF_ID, STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID, DECT_RATE, STD_UNIT, DECT_PRICE, PRICE, REMARK, PRD_COLOR, PRD_SPEC, DIFF_NUM, DIFF_RSON, BRAND, DEAL_WAY, PRD_NAME, DIFF_AMOUNT, DIFF_ATT, PRD_NO, PRD_ID, DEL_FLAG )values( #DIFF_DEAL_DTL_ID#, #STOREIN_DIFF_ID#, #STOREIN_DIFF_DTL_ID#, #DECT_RATE#, #STD_UNIT#, #DECT_PRICE#, #PRICE#, #REMARK#, #PRD_COLOR#, #PRD_SPEC#, #DIFF_NUM#, #DIFF_RSON#, #BRAND#, #DEAL_WAY#, #PRD_NAME#, #DIFF_AMOUNT#, #DIFF_ATT#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_ID#, #DEL_FLAG# )
